name: Spam Knight
description:
Spam Knight was created for the Ludum Dare #22 warm-up round.

Controls

Click on the screen to guide your spam mail around!

Instructions

Spam Knight is a puzzle game where you guide pieces of spam mail to unsuspecting people.  Navigate through a maze of internet tubes and firewalls, and utilize unsecured mail portals and malformed header bounce-pads to avoid pitfalls.

History

Really like this little game!  The walking animation is quite too slow, though.

I'm not sure why I didn't take the chance to name the character "Spamform Trollface."
